LABEL: 0x25E
STRING: My name is Metarou.

LABEL: 0x2A1
STRING: %ZI'm just a normal second year student attending a private high school.

LABEL: 0x2FD
STRING: I don't have any particular skills, and my grades are merely average.

LABEL: 0x346
STRING: I'm one of those people who're lacking in personality and individuality.

LABEL: 0x393
STRING: Speaking of which, right now my classmates are racking their heads over their career paths after graduation.

LABEL: 0x3FB
STRING: We're still second years though.

LABEL: 0x420
STRING: I think it's a bit early to be thinking about our future...

LABEL: 0x483
STRING: Everyone's studying seriously, fearing a black mark on their report, so no one dares to stand out.

LABEL: 0x50C
STRING: I'm the same, but I don't think there's any point in thinking about the future.

LABEL: 0x584
STRING: Anyways I don't even know where to begin to think about the future.

LABEL: 0x5B7
STRING: Therefore, I'll just live each day as it comes.

LABEL: 0x5FE
STRING: Today, tomorrow, and certainly... in the years ahead.

LABEL: 0x6F2
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x700
STRING: "Go〜od morning!"

LABEL: 0x7CE
STRING: As I was walking to school, I suddenly received a cheerful tap on the shoulder.

LABEL: 0x8CB
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x8D9
STRING: "Me-kun, good morning! Nice weather, isn't it?"

LABEL: 0x9BD
STRING: Oh, if it isn't Nana... You scared the shit out of me.

LABEL: 0xA17
STRING: This girl is Nana.

LABEL: 0xA38
STRING: My girlfriend.

LABEL: 0xA71
STRING: She was my childhood friend but right now she's my classmate, in the same year as me.

LABEL: 0xB6C
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0xB7A
STRING: "I made lunch for you today too! Let's eat it together during break!"

LABEL: 0xC6E
STRING: We're in different classes, but even so I never miss partaking in my girlfriend's handmade meals together at lunch, and walking back together after school.

LABEL: 0xDAB
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0xDB9
STRING: "How rare that you haven't slept in! Did you get up properly today?"

LABEL: 0xEB2
STRING: Not only does she know that I'm not a morning person and always leave at the last minute, but the little rascal just has to rub it in.

LIST.STRING: If only you could come wake me up…

LABEL: 0x1025
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x1033
STRING: "S-sow?! Again with those cruel comments〜 You better not say that to any other girl besides me."

LABEL: 0x11FD
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x120B
STRING: "No way, I'm not gonna baby you even if I lived close by! Put in some effort to get up by yourself."

LABEL: 0x130D
STRING: Our silly back and forth yapping

LABEL: 0x1344
STRING: is a scene we both take for granted.

LABEL: 0x137A
STRING: Today will be a happy normal day as usual.

LABEL: 0x13B1
STRING: Just Nana and I.

LABEL: 0x13EC
STRING: From now on, forever and ever, our unchanging days will continue...

LABEL: 0x145F
STRING: ...or so I thought up till now.

LABEL: 0x1589
STRING: Just a little while before homeroom starts... the classroom is buzzing with activity.

LABEL: 0x15EA
STRING: I guess today will be just as usual too.

LABEL: 0x1637
STRING: When class is over, then Nana will come at lunch break and we eat together...

LABEL: 0x16B3
STRING: When the afternoon is over, and school ends,

LABEL: 0x16E0
STRING: Nana and I will walk and chat on the way home, just the two of us.

LABEL: 0x1734
STRING: Surely you could find

LABEL: 0x175F
STRING: this kind of normal daily life anywhere.

LABEL: 0x1849
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x1857
STRING: "Hey, hey, Metarou. I've got some good news!"

LABEL: 0x194F
STRING: While I was at my desk, putting my bags away, someone comes talking to me in his usual cheery tone.

LABEL: 0x19DE
STRING: This is my classmate, Yukimaru.

LABEL: 0x1A20
STRING: Just like Nana, he's another childhood friend.

LABEL: 0x1A4F
STRING: He's a gaudy fellow, a famous flirt at school.

LABEL: 0x1A8F
STRING: He wasn't always like this though...

LABEL: 0x1AE0
STRING: He's usually cool and collected, but right now he was grinning with excitement.

LABEL: 0x1BFF
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x1C0D
STRING: "Did you know? Today, there's a transfer student coming to our class!"

LABEL: 0x1DA2
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x1DB0
STRING: "On top of that she's a girl, and the guy who saw her says she's really pretty!"

LABEL: 0x1EAC
STRING: Oh, I see what's up now.

LABEL: 0x1EF4
STRING: Yukimaru is well known to have a thing for cute girls.

LABEL: 0x1F2D
STRING: No wonder he can get so hyped up over one beautiful transfer student.

LABEL: 0x1F8D
STRING: However, I'm also a guy.

LABEL: 0x1FB4
STRING: So I can't say that I'm not interested either... Sorry Nana.

LABEL: 0x20EA
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x20F8
STRING: "That's awesome, isn't it? Isn't it!? Haaaaa〜 I feel like I'm gonna get a boner just by looking at her! I want to meet her soon〜!"

LABEL: 0x2218
STRING: I guess he's really looking forward to it.

LABEL: 0x2243
STRING: Yukimaru's lost in his fantasies again.

LABEL: 0x2281
STRING: He has a nice face but such a shame that it's wasted on him.

LABEL: 0x22B8
STRING: Isn't that drool dribbling from his mouth?

LABEL: 0x2303
STRING: If only you didn't act this way, you would be popular with girls for sure...

LABEL: 0x236C
STRING: Girls might think we're dirty, but this is how we men bond.

LABEL: 0x23ED
STRING: If Nana happened to catch us talking about these things, she's gonna beat me up... I'd better be careful.

LABEL: 0x255F
STRING: After a moment, homeroom started.

LABEL: 0x25B0
STRING: The homeroom teacher took a breath and then told everyone about the new transfer student.

LABEL: 0x26AB
STRING: Then they opened the door to let in─a girl with a gentle expression.

LABEL: 0x271C
STRING: She was tall and stylish, and her graceful gestures attested to her good upbringing.

LABEL: 0x2787
STRING: She was wearing a red cardigan and black tights, without so much as a hint of bare skin.

LABEL: 0x28A8
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x28B6
STRING: "Nice to meet you all, my name is Tsykho%R(4,Saiko)."

LABEL: 0x2A49
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x2A57
STRING: "Everyone, I will be in your care from now on."

LABEL: 0x2B32
STRING: Completing her self-introduction in an elegant manner... The girl named "Tsykho%R(4,Saiko)" brushed aside her long silky hair.

LABEL: 0x2BBB
STRING: Upon seeing this, several of the boys let out a cheer.

LABEL: 0x2C09
STRING: Yukimaru was no exception, his eyes glowed with admiration.

LABEL: 0x2C4C
STRING: Without a doubt he will try to go for her... I pity him though.

LABEL: 0x2CB3
STRING: ...So this is Tsykho%R(4,Saiko), huh?

LABEL: 0x2CFA
STRING: Her name's not uncommon, although it seems nostalgic for some reason. Is it my imagination?

LABEL: 0x2D67
STRING: ...Hmm?

LABEL: 0x2D95
STRING: I think the transfer student is looking at me.

LABEL: 0x2DD0
STRING: ...That can't be right, I must be too self-conscious.

LABEL: 0x2E33
STRING: Instructor

LABEL: 0x2E41
STRING: "Well then, Tsykho-san. Please use the empty seat."

LABEL: 0x2EC2
STRING: At the teacher's prompting, the transfer student nodded and headed for the desk.

LABEL: 0x2F19
STRING: ...Ah, hold on.

LABEL: 0x2F56
STRING: Speaking of empty seats in this class, it's... the one right next to mine!

LABEL: 0x2FC1
STRING: Y-you mean such a cute girl will be sitting beside me?!

LABEL: 0x3013
STRING: I'm so lucky I'm a little embarrassed

LABEL: 0x3040
STRING: because that is usually where I put my bag though.

LABEL: 0x3148
STRING: As soon as she took her seat, I could smell a pleasant aroma coming my way.

LABEL: 0x31AF
STRING: Haaah... This is bad.

LABEL: 0x31E7
STRING: The next thing I knew, my crotch started to react.

LABEL: 0x321E
STRING: Ah, this is impossible... Why do girls give off such a good smell...

LABEL: 0x3291
STRING: Urk, no, no!

LABEL: 0x32D2
STRING: If Nana found out about this happening right under her nose, I'd be lucky to be let off with just a beating!

LABEL: 0x33F1
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x33FF
STRING: "It's nice to meet you, Metarou-kun."

LABEL: 0x34D4
STRING: The transfer student politely greeted me with a smile, sending my mind into a world of flowers.

LABEL: 0x354F
STRING: O〜h, having a pretty girl call my name... and sitting next to me, it's too much to handle...

LABEL: 0x35C4
STRING: ─Huh?

LABEL: 0x35FF
STRING: Speaking of which, how did she know my name?

LABEL: 0x3653
STRING: ...Well whatever.

LABEL: 0x3676
STRING: She must have got it from someone.

LABEL: 0x36C9
STRING: Having concluded as much, I greeted her back.

LABEL: 0x3974
STRING: ─After school.

LABEL: 0x39B1
STRING: Nana and I, just the two of us, were heading to the station.

LABEL: 0x3A01
STRING: I go to school by foot, while Nana takes the train.

LABEL: 0x3A38
STRING: So we walk to the station together.

LABEL: 0x3A8D
STRING: A short date under the guise of taking Nana to the station.

LABEL: 0x3AEA
STRING: It's just a little walk, but it's the only time I get to spend alone with Nana.

LABEL: 0x3C04
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x3C12
STRING: "By the way, the transfer student was pretty cute, wasn't she."

LABEL: 0x3D00
STRING: I was thrown off-kilter when she suddenly brought up that topic.

LABEL: 0x3D50
STRING: W-wh-why does Nana know about that!?

LABEL: 0x3D8F
STRING: She's in the next class...

LABEL: 0x3E72
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x3E80
STRING: "Hmm〜? What's up, what's keeping you silent?"

LABEL: 0x3F6A
STRING: Nana asked the question as if she was trying to test me.

LABEL: 0x405F
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x406D
STRING: "She sits next to you, doesn't she? Yukimaru told me."

LABEL: 0x41F2
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x4200
STRING: "Really, you boys are so filthy. Me-kun, you had a lewd expression on your face, didn't you?"

LABEL: 0x43A9
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x43B7
STRING: "Did you think I wouldn't notice? Me-kun, you pervert."

LABEL: 0x44AB
STRING: Geh... busted.

LABEL: 0x44E3
STRING: I let down my guard for just a moment, and Nana caught it.

LABEL: 0x4524
STRING: That's why girls are scary...

LABEL: 0x4652
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x4660
STRING: "Haah. Me-kun, you were spacing out back there. At the very least, you were thinking about her, right?"

LABEL: 0x4819
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x4827
STRING: "Sheesh, while you already have me! You're the worst."

LABEL: 0x49B6
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x49C4
STRING: "Me-kun's girlfriend is me, so you can't look at other girls."

LABEL: 0x4B5B
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x4B69
STRING: "You'd better reflect on it properly, or I won't forgive you."

LABEL: 0x4C61
STRING: After saying that, Nana puffed out her cheeks in a pout.

LABEL: 0x4CC6
STRING: ...She hasn't changed since she was little, that Nana.

LABEL: 0x4D15
STRING: The fact that you sulk like this every time you don't like something hasn't changed at all.

LABEL: 0x4D84
STRING: We've known each other since childhood. Although we've always had fights, there've been times when things were a little awkward ever since we realized our feelings for each other.

LABEL: 0x4E1B
STRING: At last, about half a year ago, she confessed to me and we started going out.

LABEL: 0x4E96
STRING: If Nana had not conveyed her feelings at that time, things would have been much different now...

LABEL: 0x4FAD
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x4FBB
STRING: "...What is it, you're making a weird face."

LABEL: 0x5090
STRING: Nana stared at me, her cheeks still puffed out.

LIST.STRING: Thanks for always being at my side.

LABEL: 0x51DD
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x51EB
STRING: "...Pfft, ahaha! What? That's so sudden. It's not like you〜"

LABEL: 0x52DD
STRING: She brushed off my heartfelt expression of love with a laugh.

LABEL: 0x532F
STRING: ...Damn it.

LABEL: 0x534E
STRING: I knew I shouldn't have said that.

LABEL: 0x5441
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x544F
STRING: "You only say that kind of thing when things are looking bad for you. If you think I'd let you off that easily, you're making a big mistake, you know?"

LABEL: 0x560E
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x561C
STRING: "......But, thanks."

LABEL: 0x5701
STRING: Nana muttered to herself while blushing softly.

LABEL: 0x575C
STRING: Even though it's not like me to say something sappy like that, to see Nana like this was worth it for sure...

LABEL: 0x57DD
STRING: With these thoughts in mind, we walked off into the sunset.

LABEL: 0x5A89
STRING: After seeing Nana off, and finishing up my part-time job, I went home and started preparing dinner.

LABEL: 0x5B00
STRING: I'm more or less living by myself.

LABEL: 0x5B59
STRING: Our school is a bit far away from my hometown.

LABEL: 0x5BB6
STRING: Nana and Yukimaru still go to school from their parents' house, but it takes them almost an hour to get there from the nearest station.

LABEL: 0x5C45
STRING: That's why I'm living by myself in an apartment near the school.

LABEL: 0x5CC8
STRING: To cover my living expenses, I have an allowance from my parents and my part-time job.

LABEL: 0x5D2B
STRING: I would like those two to join as well... but they seem to have left it at that because of their parents' opinions on the matter.

LABEL: 0x5DAF
STRING: Well, sometimes Nana stays over at my place saying that it's too much trouble to go home.

LABEL: 0x5E02
STRING: Yukimaru hangs out sometimes too.

LABEL: 0x5E49
STRING: Just so you know, my place isn't a hotel!

LABEL: 0x5EAA
STRING: ...It's not like I'm not grateful to my parents for sending me money though.

LABEL: 0x5F20
STRING: It can't be taken for granted that parents will look after their children's best interests.

LABEL: 0x5F6F
STRING: And there are families who want to, but can't.

LABEL: 0x5FB4
STRING: To be honest, I'm really grateful that they're taking such good care of me.

LABEL: 0x6022
STRING: Was it back in middle school?

LABEL: 0x604D
STRING: Because my father had an affair there was a time when my parents were seriously considering divorce.

LABEL: 0x60B6
STRING: They've gone through a lot but in the end everything seems to be fine now.

LABEL: 0x611B
STRING: I hope that my parents will continue to get along in the years to come.

LABEL: 0x6188
STRING: While waiting for Nana's homemade frozen food to heat up, I filled my bowl with rice.

LABEL: 0x6207
STRING: The way she used tupperware to separate it into daily portions like this is truly a lifesaver.

LABEL: 0x6282
STRING: I'm sure Nana will make a good wife.

LABEL: 0x62CC
STRING: When we graduate, I wonder if the two of us will live together.

LABEL: 0x6318
STRING: And maybe, even get married...

LABEL: 0x637B
STRING: While stuffing my face with food thinking about such random things, the intercom rang.

LABEL: 0x643E
STRING: Who might it be, at this hour?

LABEL: 0x6495
STRING: Suspiciously, I opened the door─

LABEL: 0x658D
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x659B
STRING: "Good evening. Sorry for suddenly dropping by."

LABEL: 0x6714
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x6722
STRING: "My name is Tsykho, I just moved in next door the other day. It seems you were out yesterday, so I wanted to greet you today..."

LABEL: 0x68E3
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x69B8
STRING: To my surprise, standing there was the transfer student who just came to our class today... Tsykho.

LABEL: 0x6AE2
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x6AF0
STRING: "Um... you must be... Metarou-kun, from my class, right?"

LABEL: 0x6C85
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x6C93
STRING: "Heehee, wow! What a coincidence."

LABEL: 0x6D78
STRING: Tsykho smiled from the bottom of her heart.

LABEL: 0x6DCB
STRING: I was so charmed, I couldn't help but smile.

LABEL: 0x6E22
STRING: Did she just take a bath? I can smell a nice smell on her.

LABEL: 0x6F25
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x6F33
STRING: "Once again, I'm Tsykho, who just moved in next door. Pleased to meet you!"

LABEL: 0x70D2
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x70E0
STRING: "Here, if you would please! It's only a mere trifle though."

LABEL: 0x71C9
STRING: Smiling gracefully, she handed over what looked like a high-class gift.

LABEL: 0x722E
STRING: Just based on the outward appearance alone, it seems expensive... There's no way it's just a mere trifle.

LABEL: 0x729C
STRING: I wonder what exactly I just received.

LABEL: 0x72D3
STRING: I've got to give something in return...

LABEL: 0x73C0
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x73CE
STRING: "Ah, by any chance, are you in the middle of dinner? I'm sorry to have disturbed you."

LABEL: 0x74C7
STRING: She looked apologetic as she saw the half-eaten food spread out on the table.

LABEL: 0x7544
STRING: I told her "don't worry about it" and she deeply lowered her head.

LABEL: 0x7647
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x7655
STRING: "No, it's my timing that was bad. I'll be more careful from now on."

LABEL: 0x774E
STRING: What a good girl...

LABEL: 0x7831
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x783F
STRING: "...By the way, are you living all by yourself as well?"

LIST.STRING: My parents send me money though.

LABEL: 0x798B
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x7999
STRING: "I see! What a strange coincidence, it's the same here as well."

LABEL: 0x7A82
STRING: Upon hearing my reply she smiled softly.

LABEL: 0x7B79
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x7B87
STRING: "Well, please call me if you have any trouble. There must be many things a boy living alone has to deal with."

LABEL: 0x7D40
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x7D4E
STRING: "I'm great at cooking and housework so I can help! Surely I can be of some use to you."

LABEL: 0x7E5D
STRING: Wha... What is this development!

LABEL: 0x7E9C
STRING: As a young man living on his own, such an offer is deeply appreciated!

LABEL: 0x7F07
STRING: Having a super cute neighbour as a housekeeper... such a luxury. Isn't it too perfect?

LABEL: 0x7F7E
STRING: Of course, I couldn't say that out loud when the person in question is right there.

LABEL: 0x7FE7
STRING: "Your feelings are good enough for me," I was about to reply instead─

LABEL: 0x80EC
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x80FA
STRING: "No need to hold back. The truth is, I just moved here so I don't have any friends..."

LABEL: 0x829F
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x82AD
STRING: "If you don't mind, I'd be very happy if you could talk to me, Metarou-kun!"

LABEL: 0x83BF
STRING: Upon hearing this heaven-sent proposal, I couldn't help but relax.

LABEL: 0x8420
STRING: Sorry Nana, but men are like this... we're creatures that think with their lower body.

LABEL: 0x84B5
STRING: Suddenly, a ringtone blared out.

LABEL: 0x8502
STRING: My smartphone which I placed in the living room was ringing.

LABEL: 0x8550
STRING: I guess it's Nana.

LABEL: 0x857F
STRING: She usually calls at this time.

LABEL: 0x863A
STRING: I don't want Nana to get the wrong idea.

LABEL: 0x86F6
STRING: I apologized to Tsykho, and then rushed over to answer the phone.

LABEL: 0x8785
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x8793
STRING: "...Oh, there you are. Metarou, are you finished with your part-time work?"

LABEL: 0x8806
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x8814
STRING: "Ahaha! I just wanted to hear your voice as soon as possible, so I called at the usual time♪"

LABEL: 0x889D
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x88AB
STRING: "Did you take a bath yet? Just now I..."

STRING: 「ENTER」

LABEL: 0x8990

LABEL: 0x8A5B
STRING: Wha...

LABEL: 0x8A8E
STRING: What is this place...?

LABEL: 0x8ACD
STRING: Just exactly what happened to me?

LABEL: 0x8B14
STRING: I answered Nana's call, then suddenly my vision was distorted with noise...

LABEL: 0x8BF5
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x8C03
STRING: "How are you feeling?"

LABEL: 0x8C4B
STRING: When I looked up, I saw there was a large window on the ceiling through which Tsykho peered at me with a satisfied look on her face.

LABEL: 0x8D34
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x8D42
STRING: "Looks like it actually worked... I'm so glad... Hehe, heeheeheeheehee!! Ahahahahaha!!!"

LABEL: 0x8DD2
STRING: Tsykho's eyes widened like crazy. She looked very happy.

LABEL: 0x8E39
STRING: What's that? What happened? Did Tsykho know?

LABEL: 0x8EB8
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x8EC6
STRING: "You have no idea why you're here, right? Your puzzled look is wonderful."

LABEL: 0x8F53
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x8F61
STRING: "I've stored Metarou-kun inside my smartphone."

LABEL: 0x9014
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x9022
STRING: "Now we'll never be split apart again..."

LABEL: 0x908A
STRING: That girl... what is she talking about?

LABEL: 0x9137
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x9145
STRING: "No one can disturb us here... This world is mine and mine only, now I can have you all to myself. Hehe... haha, hahaha!!"

LABEL: 0x91E8
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x91F6
STRING: "I'm tired of having to be separated... I don't want to experience another tragedy, so I searched for an answer."

LABEL: 0x9297
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x92A5
STRING: "And I finally realized, after suffering for so long, how to erase all sadness. ...Body and mind are unnecessary."

LABEL: 0x93A6
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x93B4
STRING: "If you exist only as data... You won't feel suffering and sadness and any other painful thing!"

LABEL: 0x944D
STRING: Tsykho

LABEL: 0x945B
STRING: "Therefore─a body just gets in the way of obtaining true love."

LABEL: 0x94DB
STRING: Tsykho's laughter echoed throughout the empty cyberspace.

LABEL: 0x953A
STRING: Existing as just one piece of her smartphone's data, there's nothing I can do here...

LABEL: 0x95A0
STRING: Neither pain or suffering or sadness... or happiness.

LABEL: 0x95DD
STRING: Nothing can be felt here...

LABEL: 0x9622

LABEL: 0xA755
STRING: I opened the small gift I received from her, inside were some expensive-looking candies and...

LABEL: 0xA7C0
STRING: A cute looking kitten ornament as well as a note.

LABEL: 0xA815
STRING: I'll share the candies with Nana... but what to do with this kitten?

LABEL: 0xA882
STRING: The note said "If you put this kitten by your pillow, you will be able to have good dreams." So it's a magic charm?

LABEL: 0xA911
STRING: For the time being, I put it on an empty spot beside my bed.

LABEL: 0xA980
STRING: Tsykho, huh...

LABEL: 0xA9BD
STRING: I can't believe such a cute girl is living next to me now.

LABEL: 0xAA22
STRING: We're in same year and class and she's sitting next to me... Don't tell me this is fate?

LABEL: 0xAA99
STRING: And we're in the same apartment, so we're practically living under the same roof huh?

LABEL: 0xAB03
STRING: Oh man!

LABEL: 0xAB44
STRING: I'm getting a bit excited!

LABEL: 0xAB64
STRING: I feel like I've read a manga about this.

LABEL: 0xABA5
STRING: They say that truth is stranger than fiction, but when it actually happens to you, it's like, wow.

LABEL: 0xAC26
STRING: After cleaning up the dishes and tidying up, I was unable to suppress my excitement and quickly snuck into bed.

LABEL: 0xAF3E
STRING: Under the deep blue starry sky.

LABEL: 0xAF7F
STRING: Illuminated by twinkling stars was a girl, all by herself...

LABEL: 0xAFDE
STRING: Looking up at the sky, lost in thought.

LABEL: 0xB09E
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xB0AC
STRING: "No one... is here to see me. It's as if the world has left me behind."

LABEL: 0xB145
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xB153
STRING: "If no one sees me, it's like I never existed... Because that would mean it's the same whether I'm here or not, wouldn't it?"

LABEL: 0xB1F2
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xB200
STRING: "What should someone like me, abandoned by the whole world, cling to in life?"

LABEL: 0xB276
STRING: Before she knew it─a cat appeared next to her.

LABEL: 0xB2D5
STRING: It was a small kitten with clear, green eyes.

LABEL: 0xB33C
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xB34A
STRING: "...Why, when did you wander in here? What are you doing in this place?"

LABEL: 0xB3CF
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xB3DD
STRING: "There's nothing here. Not a soul around... except me. And I don't even know myself if I even exist either."

LABEL: 0xB47B
STRING: The kitten rubbed against her and curled up, snuggling up next to her.

LABEL: 0xB4F4
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xB502
STRING: "Perhaps... are you all by yourself as well?"

LABEL: 0xB567
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xB575
STRING: "...Heh, I'm the same. I never got any love, left to mope about and stew in my own thoughts."

LABEL: 0xB612
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xB620
STRING: "No one loved me, and I became unable to feel happiness..."

LABEL: 0xB6B1
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xB6BF
STRING: "If I tried to get involved with someone, they would run away."

LABEL: 0xB73A
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xB748
STRING: "It's very unpleasant. If I'm going to be treated like this, it would have been better to not show myself."

LABEL: 0xB7F9
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xB807
STRING: "Maybe I just want to be unhappy. Maybe I can't calm down until even the insides of my bones are soiled in mud."

LABEL: 0xB883
STRING: As if feeling worried for the depressed girl, the kitten set its gaze on her.

LABEL: 0xB90A
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xB918
STRING: "I decided by myself that I could never be happy... what I fool I am, right? Because I'm so perverse, no one in their right mind would want to associate with me."

LABEL: 0xB9D1
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xB9DF
STRING: "Papa, what did you think of me... I really don't know."

LABEL: 0xBA5E
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xBA6C
STRING: "I'm scared. Scared of being hurt by knowing other's true thoughts. You reap what you sow, I guess..."

LABEL: 0xBAFA
STRING: The girl suddenly turned to the ground, and noticed the existence of a purple die.

LABEL: 0xBB81
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xBB8F
STRING: "Dice... huh."

LABEL: 0xBBE6
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xBBF4
STRING: "Speaking of which, I've heard this saying about dice before. The pips on the back and front of a die always add up to seven."

LABEL: 0xBC88
STRING: The kitten might not have understood her words, but it often tilted its head.

LABEL: 0xBD07
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xBD15
STRING: "Ah, I know, let's do this."

LABEL: 0xBD76
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xBD84
STRING: "If I roll a 1, I'll get up and start walking. No more excuses, I want to stop running away from reality."

LABEL: 0xBE23
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0xBE31
STRING: "As a human, I should live my life like one, trying my hardest. Then... maybe something will change."

LABEL: 0xBEAD
STRING: The girl took the die into her hand and threw it up to the sky.
